title: [Patch 7.5 BUG] Pressing V results in a plain, blue ping instead of a yellow, retreat ping
body:
[Patch 7.5] Pressing V results in a plain, blue ping instead of a yellow, retreat ping.

Before you guys go and tell me to check my hotkeys, yes, I have. Other players in my games are having this issue too.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is currently a known issue and is being worked on, for now however you can take a look at this post for a band-aid solution to the problem.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/GTgkVNMV-warning-ping-short-cut-v?comment=0002
Yep experiencing the same thing. Incase you don't know, you can press Ctrl + click to retreat ping but it's super inconvenient for those of us who are used to using V.
Yeah this is ridiculous. Every time I try to ping my team back, out goes a blue ping that makes my team think we should go in...
